00016 module strings
00017 
00018 use precision
00019 
00020 private :: value_dr,value_sr,value_di,value_si
00021 private :: write_dr,write_sr,write_di,write_si
00022 private :: writeq_dr,writeq_sr,writeq_di,writeq_si
00023 
00024 interface value  ! Generic operator for converting a number string to a 
00025                  ! number. Calling syntax is 'call value(numstring,number,ios)' 
00026                  ! where 'numstring' is a number string and 'number' is a 
00027                  ! real number or an integer (single or double precision).         
00028    module procedure value_dr
00029    module procedure value_sr
00030    module procedure value_di
00031    module procedure value_si
00032 end interface
00033 
00034 interface writenum  ! Generic  interface for writing a number to a string. The 
00035                     ! number is left justified in the string. The calling syntax
00036                     ! is 'call writenum(number,string,format)' where 'number' is
00037                     ! a real number or an integer, 'string' is a character string
00038                     ! containing the result, and 'format' is the format desired, 
00039                     ! e.g., 'e15.6' or 'i5'.
00040    module procedure write_dr
00041    module procedure write_sr
00042    module procedure write_di
00043    module procedure write_si
00044 end interface
00045 
00046 interface writeq  ! Generic interface equating a name to a numerical value. The
00047                   ! calling syntax is 'call writeq(unit,name,value,format)' where
00048                   ! unit is the integer output unit number, 'name' is the variable
00049                   ! name, 'value' is the real or integer value of the variable, 
00050                   ! and 'format' is the format of the value. The result written to
00051                   ! the output unit has the form <name> = <value>.
00052    module procedure writeq_dr
00053    module procedure writeq_sr
00054    module procedure writeq_di
00055    module procedure writeq_si
00056 end interface
00057

00063 !**********************************************************************
00064 
00065 subroutine parse(str,delims,args,nargs)
00066 
00067 ! Parses the string 'str' into arguments args(1), ..., args(nargs) based on
00068 ! the delimiters contained in the string 'delims'. Preceding a delimiter in
00069 ! 'str' by a backslash (\) makes this particular instance not a delimiter.
00070 ! The integer output variable nargs contains the number of arguments found.
00071 
00072 character(len=*) :: str,delims
00073 character(len=len_trim(str)) :: strsav
00074 character(len=*),dimension(:) :: args
00075 
00076 strsav=str
00077 call compact(str)
00078 na=size(args)
00079 do i=1,na
00080   args(i)=' '
00081 end do  
00082 nargs=0
00083 lenstr=len_trim(str)
00084 if(lenstr==0) return
00085 k=0
00086 
00087 do
00088    if(len_trim(str) == 0) exit
00089    nargs=nargs+1
00090    call split(str,delims,args(nargs))
00091    call removebksl(args(nargs))
00092 end do   
00093 str=strsav
00094 
00095 end subroutine parse
00096 
00097 !**********************************************************************
00098 
00099 subroutine compact(str)
00100 
00101 ! Converts multiple spaces and tabs to single spaces; deletes control characters;
00102 ! removes initial spaces.
00103 
00104 character(len=*):: str
00105 character(len=1):: ch
00106 character(len=len_trim(str)):: outstr
00107 
00108 str=adjustl(str)
00109 lenstr=len_trim(str)
00110 outstr=' '
00111 isp=0
00112 k=0
00113 
00114 do i=1,lenstr
00115   ch=str(i:i)
00116   ich=iachar(ch)
00117   
00118   select case(ich)
00119   
00120     case(9,32)     ! space or tab character
00121       if(isp==0) then
00122         k=k+1
00123         outstr(k:k)=' '
00124       end if
00125       isp=1
00126       
00127     case(33:)      ! not a space, quote, or control character
00128       k=k+1
00129       outstr(k:k)=ch
00130       isp=0
00131       
00132   end select
00133   
00134 end do
00135 
00136 str=adjustl(outstr)
00137 
00138 end subroutine compact
00139 
00140 !**********************************************************************
00141 
00142 subroutine removesp(str)
00143 
00144 ! Removes spaces, tabs, and control characters in string str
00145 
00146 character(len=*):: str
00147 character(len=1):: ch
00148 character(len=len_trim(str))::outstr
00149 
00150 str=adjustl(str)
00151 lenstr=len_trim(str)
00152 outstr=' '
00153 k=0
00154 
00155 do i=1,lenstr
00156   ch=str(i:i)
00157   ich=iachar(ch)
00158   select case(ich)    
00159     case(0:32)  ! space, tab, or control character
00160          cycle       
00161     case(33:)  
00162       k=k+1
00163       outstr(k:k)=ch
00164   end select
00165 end do
00166 
00167 str=adjustl(outstr)
00168 
00169 end subroutine removesp

00173 subroutine value_dr(str,rnum,ios)
00174 
00175 ! Converts number string to a double precision real number
00176 
00177 character(len=*)::str
00178 real(kr8)::rnum
00179 integer :: ios
00180 
00181 ilen=len_trim(str)
00182 ipos=scan(str,'Ee')
00183 if(.not.is_digit(str(ilen:ilen)) .and. ipos/=0) then
00184    ios=3
00185    return
00186 end if
00187 read(str,*,iostat=ios) rnum
00188 
00189 end subroutine value_dr
00190 
00191 !**********************************************************************
00192 
00193 subroutine value_sr(str,rnum,ios)
00194 
00195 ! Converts number string to a single precision real number
00196 
00197 character(len=*)::str
00198 real(kr4) :: rnum
00199 real(kr8) :: rnumd 
00200 
00201 call value_dr(str,rnumd,ios)
00202 if( abs(rnumd) > huge(rnum) ) then
00203   ios=15
00204   return
00205 end if
00206 if( abs(rnumd) < tiny(rnum) ) rnum=0.0_kr4
00207 rnum=rnumd
00208 
00209 end subroutine value_sr
00210 
00211 !**********************************************************************
00212 
00213 subroutine value_di(str,inum,ios)
00214 
00215 ! Converts number string to a double precision integer value
00216 
00217 character(len=*)::str
00218 integer(ki8) :: inum
00219 real(kr8) :: rnum
00220 
00221 call value_dr(str,rnum,ios)
00222 if(abs(rnum)>huge(inum)) then
00223   ios=15
00224   return
00225 end if
00226 inum=nint(rnum,ki8)
00227 
00228 end subroutine value_di
00229 
00230 !**********************************************************************
00231 
00232 subroutine value_si(str,inum,ios)
00233 
00234 ! Converts number string to a single precision integer value
00235 
00236 character(len=*)::str
00237 integer(ki4) :: inum
00238 real(kr8) :: rnum
00239 
00240 call value_dr(str,rnum,ios)
00241 if(abs(rnum)>huge(inum)) then
00242   ios=15
00243   return
00244 end if
00245 inum=nint(rnum,ki4)
00246 
00247 end subroutine value_si

00249 !**********************************************************************

00251 subroutine shiftstr(str,n)
00252  
00253 ! Shifts characters in in the string 'str' n positions (positive values
00254 ! denote a right shift and negative values denote a left shift). Characters
00255 ! that are shifted off the end are lost. Positions opened up by the shift 
00256 ! are replaced by spaces.
00257 
00258 character(len=*):: str
00259 
00260 lenstr=len(str)
00261 nabs=iabs(n)
00262 if(nabs>=lenstr) then
00263   str=repeat(' ',lenstr)
00264   return
00265 end if
00266 if(n<0) str=str(nabs+1:)//repeat(' ',nabs)  ! shift left
00267 if(n>0) str=repeat(' ',nabs)//str(:lenstr-nabs)  ! shift right 
00268 return
00269 
00270 end subroutine shiftstr
00271 
00272 !**********************************************************************
00273 
00274 subroutine insertstr(str,strins,loc)
00275 
00276 ! Inserts the string 'strins' into the string 'str' at position 'loc'. 
00277 ! Characters in 'str' starting at position 'loc' are shifted right to
00278 ! make room for the inserted string. Trailing spaces of 'strins' are 
00279 ! removed prior to insertion
00280 
00281 character(len=*):: str,strins
00282 character(len=len(str))::tempstr
00283 
00284 lenstrins=len_trim(strins)
00285 tempstr=str(loc:)
00286 call shiftstr(tempstr,lenstrins)
00287 tempstr(1:lenstrins)=strins(1:lenstrins)
00288 str(loc:)=tempstr
00289 return
00290 
00291 end subroutine insertstr
00292 
00293 !**********************************************************************
00294 
00295 subroutine delsubstr(str,substr)
00296 
00297 ! Deletes first occurrence of substring 'substr' from string 'str' and
00298 ! shifts characters left to fill hole. Trailing spaces or blanks are
00299 ! not considered part of 'substr'.
00300 
00301 character(len=*):: str,substr
00302 
00303 lensubstr=len_trim(substr)
00304 ipos=index(str,substr)
00305 if(ipos==0) return
00306 if(ipos == 1) then
00307    str=str(lensubstr+1:)
00308 else
00309    str=str(:ipos-1)//str(ipos+lensubstr:)
00310 end if   
00311 return
00312 
00313 end subroutine delsubstr
00314 
00315 !**********************************************************************
00316 
00317 subroutine delall(str,substr)
00318 
00319 ! Deletes all occurrences of substring 'substr' from string 'str' and
00320 ! shifts characters left to fill holes.
00321 
00322 character(len=*):: str,substr
00323 
00324 lensubstr=len_trim(substr)
00325 do
00326    ipos=index(str,substr)
00327    if(ipos == 0) exit
00328    if(ipos == 1) then
00329       str=str(lensubstr+1:)
00330    else
00331       str=str(:ipos-1)//str(ipos+lensubstr:)
00332    end if
00333 end do   
00334 return
00335 
00336 end subroutine delall

00340 function uppercase(str) result(ucstr)
00341 
00342 ! convert string to upper case
00343 
00344 character (len=*):: str
00345 character (len=len_trim(str)):: ucstr
00346 
00347 ilen=len_trim(str)
00348 ioffset=iachar('A')-iachar('a')     
00349 iquote=0
00350 ucstr=str
00351 do i=1,ilen
00352   iav=iachar(str(i:i))
00353   if(iquote==0 .and. (iav==34 .or.iav==39)) then
00354     iquote=1
00355     iqc=iav
00356     cycle
00357   end if
00358   if(iquote==1 .and. iav==iqc) then
00359     iquote=0
00360     cycle
00361   end if
00362   if (iquote==1) cycle
00363   if(iav >= iachar('a') .and. iav <= iachar('z')) then
00364     ucstr(i:i)=achar(iav+ioffset)
00365   else
00366     ucstr(i:i)=str(i:i)
00367   end if
00368 end do
00369 return
00370 
00371 end function uppercase
00372 
00373 !**********************************************************************
00374 
00375 function lowercase(str) result(lcstr)
00376 
00377 ! convert string to lower case
00378 
00379 character (len=*):: str
00380 character (len=len_trim(str)):: lcstr
00381 
00382 ilen=len_trim(str)
00383 ioffset=iachar('A')-iachar('a')
00384 iquote=0
00385 lcstr=str
00386 do i=1,ilen
00387   iav=iachar(str(i:i))
00388   if(iquote==0 .and. (iav==34 .or.iav==39)) then
00389     iquote=1
00390     iqc=iav
00391     cycle
00392   end if
00393   if(iquote==1 .and. iav==iqc) then
00394     iquote=0
00395     cycle
00396   end if
00397   if (iquote==1) cycle
00398   if(iav >= iachar('A') .and. iav <= iachar('Z')) then
00399     lcstr(i:i)=achar(iav-ioffset)
00400   else
00401     lcstr(i:i)=str(i:i)
00402   end if
00403 end do
00404 return
00405 
00406 end function lowercase

00410 subroutine readline(nunitr,line,ios)
00411 
00412 ! Reads line from unit=nunitr, ignoring blank lines
00413 ! and deleting comments beginning with an exclamation point(!)
00414 
00415 character (len=*):: line
00416 
00417 do  
00418   read(nunitr,'(a)', iostat=ios) line      ! read input line
00419   if(ios /= 0) return
00420   line=adjustl(line)
00421   ipos=index(line,'!')
00422   if(ipos == 1) cycle
00423   if(ipos /= 0) line=line(:ipos-1)
00424   if(len_trim(line) /= 0) exit
00425 end do
00426 return
00427 
00428 end subroutine readline
00429 
00430 !**********************************************************************
00431 
00432 subroutine match(str,ipos,imatch)
00433 
00434 ! Sets imatch to the position in string of the delimiter matching the delimiter
00435 ! in position ipos. Allowable delimiters are (), [], {}, <>.
00436 
00437 character(len=*) :: str
00438 character :: delim1,delim2,ch
00439 
00440 lenstr=len_trim(str)
00441 delim1=str(ipos:ipos)
00442 select case(delim1)
00443    case('(')
00444       idelim2=iachar(delim1)+1
00445       istart=ipos+1
00446       iend=lenstr
00447       inc=1
00448    case(')')
00449       idelim2=iachar(delim1)-1
00450       istart=ipos-1
00451       iend=1
00452       inc=-1
00453    case('[','{','<')
00454       idelim2=iachar(delim1)+2
00455       istart=ipos+1
00456       iend=lenstr
00457       inc=1
00458    case(']','}','>')
00459       idelim2=iachar(delim1)-2
00460       istart=ipos-1
00461       iend=1
00462       inc=-1
00463    case default
00464       write(*,*) delim1,' is not a valid delimiter'
00465       return
00466 end select
00467 if(istart < 1 .or. istart > lenstr) then
00468    write(*,*) delim1,' has no matching delimiter'
00469    return
00470 end if
00471 delim2=achar(idelim2) ! matching delimiter
00472 
00473 isum=1
00474 do i=istart,iend,inc
00475    ch=str(i:i)
00476    if(ch /= delim1 .and. ch /= delim2) cycle
00477    if(ch == delim1) isum=isum+1
00478    if(ch == delim2) isum=isum-1
00479    if(isum == 0) exit
00480 end do
00481 if(isum /= 0) then
00482    write(*,*) delim1,' has no matching delimiter'
00483    return
00484 end if   
00485 imatch=i
00486 
00487 return
00488 
00489 end subroutine match

00494

00500

00503 str=adjustl(str)
00504 
00505 end subroutine write_dr

00555 !***********************************************************************
00556 
00557 subroutine trimzero(str)
00558 
00559 ! Deletes nonsignificant trailing zeroes from number string str. If number
00560 ! string ends in a decimal point, one trailing zero is added.
00561 
00562 character(len=*) :: str
00563 character :: ch
00564 character(len=10) :: exp
00565 
00566 ipos=scan(str,'eE')
00567 if(ipos>0) then
00568    exp=str(ipos:)
00569    str=str(1:ipos-1)
00570 endif
00571 lstr=len_trim(str)
00572 do i=lstr,1,-1
00573    ch=str(i:i)
00574    if(ch=='0') cycle          
00575    if(ch=='.') then
00576       str=str(1:i)//'0'
00577       if(ipos>0) str=trim(str)//trim(exp)
00578       exit
00579    endif
00580    str=str(1:i)
00581    exit
00582 end do
00583 if(ipos>0) str=trim(str)//trim(exp)
00584 
00585 end subroutine trimzero
00586 
00587 !**********************************************************************
00588 
00589 subroutine writeq_dr(unit,namestr,value,fmt)
00590 
00591 ! Writes a string of the form <name> = value to unit
00592 
00593 real(kr8) :: value
00594 integer :: unit
00595 character(len=*) :: namestr,fmt
00596 character(len=32) :: tempstr
00597 
00598 call writenum(value,tempstr,fmt)
00599 call trimzero(tempstr)
00600 write(unit,*) trim(namestr)//' = '//trim(tempstr)
00601 
00602 end subroutine writeq_dr
00603

00655 function is_letter(ch) result(res)
00656 
00657 ! Returns .true. if ch is a letter and .false. otherwise
00658 
00659 character :: ch
00660 logical :: res
00661 
00662 select case(ch)
00663 case('A':'Z','a':'z')
00664   res=.true.
00665 case default
00666   res=.false.
00667 end select
00668 return
00669 
00670 end function is_letter
00671 
00672 !**********************************************************************
00673 
00674 function is_digit(ch) result(res)
00675 
00676 ! Returns .true. if ch is a digit (0,1,...,9) and .false. otherwise
00677 
00678 character :: ch
00679 logical :: res
00680 
00681 select case(ch)
00682 case('0':'9')
00683   res=.true.
00684 case default
00685   res=.false.
00686 end select
00687 return
00688 
00689 end function is_digit
00690 
00691 !**********************************************************************
00692 
00693 subroutine split(str,delims,before,sep)
00694 
00695 ! Routine finds the first instance of a character from 'delims' in the
00696 ! the string 'str'. The characters before the found delimiter are
00697 ! output in 'before'. The characters after the found delimiter are
00698 ! output in 'str'. The optional output character 'sep' contains the 
00699 ! found delimiter. A delimiter in 'str' is treated like an ordinary 
00700 ! character if it is preceded by a backslash (\). If the backslash 
00701 ! character is desired in 'str', then precede it with another backslash.
00702 
00703 character(len=*) :: str,delims,before
00704 character,optional :: sep
00705 logical :: pres
00706 character :: ch,cha
00707 
00708 pres=present(sep)
00709 str=adjustl(str)
00710 call compact(str)
00711 lenstr=len_trim(str)
00712 if(lenstr == 0) return        ! string str is empty
00713 k=0
00714 ibsl=0                        ! backslash initially inactive
00715 before=' '
00716 do i=1,lenstr
00717    ch=str(i:i)
00718    if(ibsl == 1) then          ! backslash active
00719       k=k+1
00720       before(k:k)=ch
00721       ibsl=0
00722       cycle
00723    end if
00724    if(ch == '\\') then          ! backslash with backslash inactive
00725       k=k+1
00726       before(k:k)=ch
00727       ibsl=1
00728       cycle
00729    end if
00730    ipos=index(delims,ch)         
00731    if(ipos == 0) then          ! character is not a delimiter
00732       k=k+1
00733       before(k:k)=ch
00734       cycle
00735    end if
00736    if(ch /= ' ') then          ! character is a delimiter that is not a space
00737       str=str(i+1:)
00738       if(pres) sep=ch
00739       exit
00740    end if
00741    cha=str(i+1:i+1)            ! character is a space delimiter
00742    iposa=index(delims,cha)
00743    if(iposa > 0) then          ! next character is a delimiter
00744       str=str(i+2:)
00745       if(pres) sep=cha
00746       exit
00747    else
00748       str=str(i+1:)
00749       if(pres) sep=ch
00750       exit
00751    end if
00752 end do
00753 if(i >= lenstr) str=''
00754 str=adjustl(str)              ! remove initial spaces
00755 return
00756 
00757 end subroutine split
00758 
00759 !**********************************************************************
00760 
00761 subroutine removebksl(str)
00762 
00763 ! Removes backslash (\) characters. Double backslashes (\\) are replaced
00764 ! by a single backslash.
00765 
00766 character(len=*):: str
00767 character(len=1):: ch
00768 character(len=len_trim(str))::outstr
00769 
00770 str=adjustl(str)
00771 lenstr=len_trim(str)
00772 outstr=' '
00773 k=0
00774 ibsl=0                        ! backslash initially inactive
00775 
00776 do i=1,lenstr
00777   ch=str(i:i)
00778   if(ibsl == 1) then          ! backslash active
00779    k=k+1
00780    outstr(k:k)=ch
00781    ibsl=0
00782    cycle
00783   end if
00784   if(ch == '\\') then          ! backslash with backslash inactive
00785    ibsl=1
00786    cycle
00787   end if
00788   k=k+1
00789   outstr(k:k)=ch              ! non-backslash with backslash inactive
00790 end do
00791 
00792 str=adjustl(outstr)
00793 
00794 end subroutine removebksl
00795 
00796 !**********************************************************************
00797 
00798 end module strings  
00799 
00800
